basic_usage.description: Basic usage of TokenAdapter to get token information
basic_usage.code:
from adapters.token_adapter.adapter import TokenAdapter

# Initialize adapter (no config needed)
adapter = TokenAdapter()

# Get token by address
success, data = await adapter.get_token_by_address("0x1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12345678")
if success:
    print(f"Token symbol: {data.get('symbol')}")
    print(f"Token name: {data.get('name')}")
    print(f"Decimals: {data.get('decimals')}")
else:
    print(f"Error: {data}")

get_by_token_id.description: Get token information using token ID
get_by_token_id.code:
from adapters.token_adapter.adapter import TokenAdapter

# Initialize adapter (no config needed)
adapter = TokenAdapter()

# Get token by ID
success, data = await adapter.get_token_by_id("token-12345")
if success:
    print(f"Token data: {data}")
else:
    print(f"Error: {data}")

flexible_lookup.description: Use flexible get_token method that tries both address and token_id
flexible_lookup.code:
from adapters.token_adapter.adapter import TokenAdapter

# Initialize adapter (no config needed)
adapter = TokenAdapter()

# Try both address and token_id
success, data = await adapter.get_token(
    address="0x1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12345678",
    token_id="token-12345"
)
if success:
    print(f"Found token: {data}")
else:
    print(f"Token not found: {data}")

error_handling.description: Proper error handling for various scenarios

health_check.code:
from adapters.token_adapter.adapter import TokenAdapter

# Initialize adapter (no config needed)
adapter = TokenAdapter()

# Check health
health = await adapter.health_check()
print(f"Adapter status: {health['status']}")
print(f"Connected: {health['connected']}")
print(f"Adapter type: {health['adapter']}")

if health['status'] == 'healthy':
    print("Adapter is ready to use")
else:
    print(f"Adapter has issues: {health.get('error', 'Unknown error')}")

batch_operations.code:
from adapters.token_adapter.adapter import TokenAdapter
import asyncio

# Initialize adapter (no config needed)
adapter = TokenAdapter()

# List of token addresses to lookup
token_addresses = [
    "0x1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12345678",
    "0xabcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12",
    "0x9876543210fedcba9876543210fedcba98765432"
]

# Batch lookup
token_data = {}
for address in token_addresses:
    success, data = await adapter.get_token_by_address(address)
    if success:
        token_data[address] = data
    else:
        print(f"Failed to get token for {address}: {data}")

print(f"Successfully retrieved {len(token_data)} tokens")
for address, data in token_data.items():
    print(f"{address}: {data.get('symbol', 'Unknown')} - {data.get('name', 'Unknown')}")
